definition: the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)

sentences.english: The cool night time, will cover the quilt, but during the day but still very hot.
sentences.chinese: 秋凉的时候，夜里要盖被子了，可是白天却依然很热。

sentences.english: Her flat black suede boots and cardigan help make this cooler weather appropriate.
sentences.chinese: 黑色平底的山羊皮长靴和羊毛衫让秋凉望而却步。

sentences.english: Early in the morning when the sliding window, there is the smell of rain, but the thick autumn is coming.
sentences.chinese: 晨起推窗，还有雨的气息，但那浓浓的秋凉扑面而来。

definition: Hanlu or Cold Dew, 17th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 8th-22nd October
early autumn/7th month of the lunar calendar
Lidong or Start of Winter, 19th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st November
autumn frost/fig. white hair as sign of old age
Liqiu or Start of Autumn, 13th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-22nd August
Shuangjiang or Frost Descends, 18th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd October-6th November
to rustle in the air/to rustle/to sough/bleak/desolate/chilly
